title: G2 Mid laner looking for team or duo jgler for solo duo.
body: Just a gold 2 player looking to get to plat. started off in bronze this season. I know it sounds bad. But either looking for a team or a duo jgler/ top laner. I am able to also play adc.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=4rtificialAlpha,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=s6XpEcQL,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-02-25T18:48:34.670+0000)
>
> Just a gold 2 player looking to get to plat. started off in bronze this season. I know it sounds bad. But either looking for a team or a duo jgler/ top laner. I am able to also play adc.

Na man, I started in bronze last season to. Didn't play much about 150 games total and made it to silver 1. I jungle main and been smashing talon lately. You always start really low! 

I mean from bronze to silver 1 in 150 games is pretty good would have made gold if I had more time to play. I plan on plat this season! Get Internet in 3 more days then I'll start the climb!

Hey, 

I'm a JG main with top/support as my secondary. I haven't done promos for this season yet. Feels shit to say but I was bronze 2 last season but it was the first season that I played and I did my provisionals as soon as I hit lvl 30. I believe I am much better now. You are welcome to add me. I'm keen to go for some norms first if you'd like to see how I play and see how we go after that. 

I won't be offended if you don't want to play with me. And good luck in getting to plat.
